results.title: Is Metformin Associated with a Lower Prevalence of Polyps, Adenomas, and Colorectal Carcinoma in Patients with Diabetes Mellitus?

results.title: Colon neoplasia in patients with type 2 diabetes on metformin: A meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: The risk of @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@colon neoplasia@@@ was significantly lower among @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ users than controls (non-@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ users) [pooled RRs (95% CI)=0.75 (0.65-0.87), test for overall effect Z=-3.95, p<0.001].

citations.NLM: Rokkas T, Portincasa P. Colon neoplasia in patients with type 2 diabetes on metformin: A meta-analysis. Eur J Intern Med. 2016 Sep;33():60-6. PMID: 27318643
